title: Customer Satisfaction Survey 2025
description: Help us improve our services by sharing your feedback about your recent experience with our company.
thankYouMessage: Thank you for taking the time to complete our customer satisfaction survey. Your feedback helps us serve you better!
thankYouEmailSubject: Thank you for your valuable feedback
thankYouEmailBody: We appreciate you taking the time to share your thoughts with us. Your feedback is important and will help us improve our services.

questions.questionText: How would you rate your overall experience with our company?
questions.helpText: Please consider all aspects of your interaction with us

questions.questionText: Which of our services have you used in the past 6 months?
What is the primary reason for choosing our company?
Would you recommend our services to a friend or colleague?
What other services would you like us to offer?
questions.helpText: Select an option or specify your own

questions.questionText: Please share any additional comments or suggestions for improvement:
questions.helpText: Your detailed feedback helps us understand how we can better serve you
